title: Maurice Sendak
creator_credit: Weston Woods Studios and Morton Schindel
brief_description: A visit to Maurice Sendak in his studio apartment, where he speaks of his favourite composers, expresses his admiration for painters and illustrators of the past, tells how these artists have influenced his own work, and traces the development of the book ‘Where the Wild Things Are’.
